roleset.name: the process of (causing to lose or) losing hair, fur, feathers, scales, etc.
roleset.note: BALD-V, BALDING-N, BALDING-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: bald-v
example.text: After intensive radiation treatments permanently balded him, his prospects began to look even worse.

example.name: bald-v
example.text: He wasn't happy that he was balding on top, but in a way that made him look tough, too.

example.name: balding-j
example.text: He looked fine with his balding head and beard, then one day he shaved it all off.

roleset.name: lacking hair (particularly on the head), fur, feathers, scales, etc.
roleset.note: BALD-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: bald-j
example.text: I rescued a tang much like you did about a month or two ago and he was completely bald of scales save for those two white stripes.
example.arg: save for those two white stripes

example.name: bald-j
example.text: The man was bald and appeared to have no neck.

roleset.name: the process of (causing to wear or) wearing away a surface
roleset.note: BALD-V, BALDING-N, BALDING-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: bald-v
example.text: Upon returning the golf cart the managers claimed we "balded" the tires on the golf cart.
example.arg: the tires on the golf cart

example.name: bald-v
example.text: If your shoes are balding on the insides, you might be looking at falling arches, or possibly, you're knock-kneed.

example.name: balding-j
example.text: Driving on balding tires makes your car a lot more vulnerable on the road.

roleset.name: the state of having a worn down surface
roleset.note: BALD-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: bald-j
example.text: If you reach the point where there's 2/32nds of an inch of tread or less left, the tires are bald and are considered legally worn out in most states.
example.arg: If you reach the point where there's 2/32nds of an inch of tread or less left

roleset.name: having white markings on the head
roleset.note: BALD-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

roleset.name: unadorned, plain, bare, lacking
roleset.note: BALD-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: bald-j
example.text: In the Rustler Hills of eastern Culberson County, which-1 *-1 are often completely bald of vegetation because of the high gypsum content of the soils,
example.arg: because of the high gypsum content

example.name: bald-j
example.text: It is completely bald of incident.

example.name: bald-j
example.text: Mr. Truex particularly comes very near to triumphing over lines which-1 *-1 are completely bald of wit and rely for their laughs purely on their suggestiveness.

roleset.name: unabashed, blunt
roleset.note: BALD-J NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.

example.name: bald-j
example.text: Are there notorious, bald lies from American political history? Absolutely.

example.name: bald-faced-j
example.text: The McClellan press briefings have been a study in bald-faced institutionalized lie-fests for years.
